prompts.generateManagedApplicationToRouterMessag: Add Application to Managed Application Router
prompts.directBindingDestinationHint: The app router is configured to use direct service binding.
prompts.overwriteMessage: Editing the deployment configuration will overwrite the existing configuration. Are you sure you want to continue?
prompts.overwriteHintMessage: Deployment configuration will abort if you choose 'No'. Click 'Finish' to complete the process.
prompts.addConnectivityMessage: Add connectivity service (required for connections to on-premise systems)?
prompts.selectServiceMessage: ABAP Environment for Direct Service Binding

routerType.managedAppRouter: Add Application to Managed Application Router
routerType.appFrontAppService: Add Application to Application Frontend Service

errors.emptyDestinationNameError: You must provide a destination name to continue.
errors.destinationNameError: The destination name must only contain letters, digits, dashes, and underscores.
errors.destinationNameLengthError: The destination name cannot exceed 200 characters.
errors.folderDoesNotExistError: The folder path does not exist: {{- filePath}}. Check the folder has the correct permissions.
errors.noMtaIdError: The MTA ID cannot be empty.
errors.mtaIdLengthError: The MTA ID must not exceed 100 characters.
errors.invalidMtaIdError: The MTA ID must only contain letters, numbers, dashes, periods, and underscores. It cannot contain spaces or begin with a number.
errors.mtaIdAlreadyExistError: A folder with the same name already exists at: {{- mtaPath}}. Choose a different MTA ID.
errors.errorScpAbapSourceDiscoveryCheckLog: For more information, see the Application Wizard console output view.
errors.windowsMtaIdPathTooLong: The combined length {{length}} of the MTA ID and MTA path exceeds the default Windows paths length. This may cause issues with MTA project generation.

warning.btpDestinationListWarning: BTP destinations are only retrieved on SAP Business Application Studio.
warning.appFrontendServiceRouterChoice: You need to have the Application Frontend service enabled for your subaccount.

info.addManagedAppRouter: Add managed application router is enabled.
info.addConnectivityService: Add connectivity service is enabled in CF application router.
info.addABAPServiceBinding: ABAP service binding is enabled in CF application router.
